comment.body: "Everyone dies alone. But if you mean something to someone, if you help or love someone, if even a single person remembers you, then maybe… you never really die at all."

"Everyone dies alone. But if you mean something to someone, if you help or love someone, if even a single person remembers you, then maybe… you never really die at all."

@0nigga: you seem to pick up bullshit lines willy-nilly
